channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Maker of Ozempic Is Trying to Block Compounded Versions of Its Blockbuster Drug
item.description: Novo Nordisk has asked the FDA to block production of compounded copies of Ozempic, arguing that it’s too difficult to do safely. It’s the latest esca...

item.title: Microsoft Warns Foreign Disinformation Is Hitting the US Election From All Directions
item.description: Russia, Iran, and China are targeting the US election with an evolving array of influence operations in the last days of campaign season.

item.title: Bookcase can turn an iPhone into an e-reader
item.description: Amazon made a big splash in e-reader land last week with the release of its first-ever color Kindle. When it comes to devoted e-readers here in the St...

item.title: Wayve starts testing its buzzy end-to-end self-driving tech in the US
item.description: Buzzy, well-funded U.K. startup Wayve is starting to test its self-learning automated driving software in San Francisco, and it’s celebrating that ent...

item.title: Nigeria Drops Charges Against Tigran Gambaryan, Jailed Binance Exec and Former IRS Agent
item.description: After eight months, one of the US’s most prominent crypto-crime investigators may finally be coming home.

item.title: Longtime policy researcher Miles Brundage leaves OpenAI
item.description: Miles Brundage, a longtime policy researcher at OpenAI and senior adviser to the company’s AGI readiness team, has left. In a post on X on Wednesday a...

item.title: Liquid AI Is Redesigning the Neural Network
item.description: Inspired by microscopic worms, Liquid AI’s founders developed a more adaptive, less energy-hungry kind of neural network. Now the MIT spin-off is reve...

item.title: Arm reportedly cancels Qualcomm design license
item.description: In a move that could profoundly affect an already beleaguered global supply chain, Arm has reportedly issued Qualcomm a 60-day notice of cancelation f...

item.title: Philly’s Portal is like social media come to life
item.description: For once, the biggest tourist attraction in Philadelphia’s Love Park isn’t the iconic artwork that gives the plaza its name. While a couple of tourist...

item.title: The Eero Outdoor 7 Brings Wi-Fi to the Backyard
item.description: Amazon’s Eero unveils the weatherproof Outdoor 7 to extend Wi-Fi coverage across your property.
